author: Mary Lynn Lutenski

review: Love this little stick being a Prime member. I'm always watching movies off of it or listening to music. Setup was easy. Haven't had the best of luck with the YouTube app download on this for some reason. The app downloads just fine but when I purchased a movie off of Google Play it never had any playback. Just the spinning wheel of boredom. I believe it had hung up on a few extra screens where you had to confirm age and so forth which I ended up finding by logging on through the internet otherwise I would've never known. I did try to view a couple other quick videos to see if it was just that movie but didn't have much luck with those either. I can always watch YouTube on other devices though so it's not that big a deal just kind of annoying. Other than that I really like this product especially since it quite nicely eliminates the cord from the Kindle to the TV HDMI port! If you're not a Prime member you'd probably be better off with a Chromecast or alternate competitors device. The selling point on this is really the free stuff that comes with the membership.

review: This has been a disappointment.  The user interface is VERY slow.  Sometimes it freezes.
